name: Uncle Lee strikes again
description:
Uncle Lee did it again.  Only you can fix reality as we know it.

"Uncle Lee strikes again" is a short point & click adventure in pixel art. You play as Ines, a 15-year-old girl with an ...unconventional  uncle.

This game was originally meant for the LÖVE JAM 2022 but we didn't manage to finish it in time. The font used in the game is available as a free resource here.

Credits
  • Andrea Cerbone (Cerbo) - writing, art and animation
  • Paolo Cotrone (shamisenorchestra) - original music
  • Giuseppe Sellaroli (apicici) - writing, programming, additional art and sounds, font design
